title: Quiz example
text:
This document illustrates the usage of the naquiz quarto extension.
The extension enables adding multiple choice questions when using HTML documents. It also adds Alpine.js javascript framework to the document.

title: Quiz example
text:
A basic example

Bill Gates was the founder of:




 ✗Apple


 ✓Microsoft


 ✗Facebook


 ✗Google

title: Quiz example
section: A quiz with a clear answer button
text:
A quiz with a clear answer button

Bill Gates was the founder of:




 ✗Apple


 ✓Microsoft


 ✗Facebook


 ✗Google


Clear answer

title: Quiz example
text:
A quiz with additional buttons

Bill Gates was the founder of:




 ✗Apple


 ✓Microsoft


 ✗Facebook


 ✗Google


Clear answer











Show hint

The company name starts with an ‘M’…






Show Answer

Bill Gates and Paul Allen founded Microsoft on April 4, 1975.

title: Quiz example
section: A quiz with additional information in callouts
text:
A quiz with additional information in callouts

Bill Gates was the founder of:




 ✗Apple


 ✓Microsoft


 ✗Facebook


 ✗Google


Clear answer














Hint





The company name starts with an ‘M’…









Answer





Bill Gates and Paul Allen founded Microsoft on April 4, 1975.
